original_title: Solid Foundations, Stronger Futures: ICC Readymix powers Sri Lanka’s construction growth
original_body_lines: ICC (International Construction Consortium Pvt Ltd) revolutionised Sri Lanka’s construction industry in 1992 by introducing Readymix concrete, marking the start of a new era in building technology and operational efficiency. With over three decades of experience, ICC Readymix continues to lead the industry, delivering high-performance concrete solutions for projects ranging from residential developments to major infrastructure across the island.

With strategically located batching plants in Madapatha and Galkulama, ICC Readymix ensures easy access and rapid delivery across regions, supporting the pace and scale of modern construction demands.

Offering a full range of concrete grades from G10 to G70, ICC Readymix caters to a wide variety of structural requirements. Whether it’s durable foundations for homes or high-strength mixes for commercial towers, ICC Readymix delivers materials that meet the highest standards of strength, durability, and precision.

Beyond its product line, ICC Readymix stands out for its hands-on service and technical expertise. A team of seasoned professionals supports clients throughout the construction process, ensuring the right solutions are applied every time.

In a sector where timing is everything, ICC Readymix’s on-time delivery and efficient logistics give contractors the edge they need to stay on schedule and avoid costly delays. The company also offers custom-designed concrete mixes, tailored to meet specific environmental, structural, or hygienic requirements, an essential feature for hospitals, sensitive facilities, and specialised buildings.
As Sri Lanka’s skyline evolves and infrastructure projects expand, ICC Readymix remains at the forefront, combining advanced batching technology with a customer-first mindset.

With decades of experience and a legacy of trust, ICC continues to be more than just a supplier. It indeed is a key partner in building the nation’s future. With its proven track record, strategic presence, and deep expertise, ICC Readymix isn’t just delivering concrete but laying the groundwork for Sri Lanka’s future.
